alert.note: Alert for Greene; Hale; Marengo (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 27 at 7:59PM CDT until March 29 at 6:04PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Alabama... Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam affecting Greene, Marengo and Hale Counties. .Levels continue to fall on the Black Warrior River at Selden Lock and Dam but remain above flood stage. A flood warning remains in effect. Another statement will be issued by Monday morning, or sooner if conditions warrant. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Black Warrior River At Selden Lock and Dam. * WHEN...Until Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 90.0 feet, Pasture and wood lands begin to flood. Livestock should be moved to higher ground at stages above 90 feet. At 94.0 feet, Some secondary roads in the area begin to flood. Flooding of farm and pasture lands continues. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 95.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:45 PM CDT Sunday was 97.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Tuesday morning and continue falling to 80.0 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 90.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
